definition: a scar or pit on the skin that is left by a pustule of smallpox or acne or other eruptive disease, mark with or as if with pockmarks
details:
noun
- a scar or pit on the skin that is left by a pustule of smallpox or acne or other eruptive disease
verb
- mark with or as if with pockmarks
= example: mark with or as if with pockmarks
